alert.note: Alert for Kivalina and Red Dog Dock (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 11 at 10:58AM AKST until December 11 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. Visibiltiy one quarter mile or less. * WHERE...Kivalina and Red Dog Dock. * WHEN...Until 9 PM AKST this evening. * IMPACTS...Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel extremely difficult.
